name: Super Drive Demo
description:
The first game for AzizBgBoss which is created by Unity Engine ( The best engine for beginners! ). It's just a simple game where you'll find a car and run around in a simple world, and you'll find a simple racing track too! When you pass through "START" tent, a ghost will race with you. You'll find it a bit stupid 'cause that's me who was driving it :/

Anyways, I wish that you like it. And consider sharing it with your friends.

FULL EDITION COMING SOON !

With love, AzizBgBoss.
